Authority to offer and grant share awards and to allot and issue shares under the BWI Performance Share Scheme

“That, pursuant to Section 161 of the Act, the Directors of the Company be and are hereby authorised and empowered to offer and grant awards in accordance with the BWI Performance Share Scheme (the “PSS”) and to allot and issue from time to time such number of fully-paid ordinary shares in the capital of the Company (“Shares”) as may be required to be issued pursuant to the vesting of awards under the PSS, provided always that the aggregate number of Shares to be allotted and issued pursuant to the PSS, when added to the aggregate number of Shares issued and issuable pursuant to all other share schemes of the Company, shall not exceed fifteen per cent. (15%) of the total number of issued shares (excluding treasury shares and subsidiary holdings) of the Company from time to time.” (Resolution 9)
